title: great but ...
comment: this and the full version are great, but they don't interact well with cm11 on the galaxy tab 7 plus (gt-p6210). I had extremely shortened battery life and severe instability system wide after installing, and those were resolved after removal. I have an oddball setup so YMMV.

Oops, sorry hearing this. With all other devices it seems to work well - at least there are no other reports of this kind. Unfortunately we do not have this configuration and therefore can't verify/fix this problem.
